root.name: Money Bags: Beat the Gnome of Zurich
root.description: Money Bags is a finance simulation game released for MS-DOS in 1988. The game allows you to play as a finance expert, and you are given a year to work with a sum of $1,000,000, and make it grow as much as possible. The game has four main skill levels, and excluding the easiest, all of them will eventually pit you against the 'Gnome of Zurich', who is a legendary banker with great skill in finances. Â In order to turn this million dollars into a bigger sum, you will need to keep a close eye on markets and stocks in-game, as well as investing in suitable manners.
